name: Under The Luminance
description:
Under The Luminance is a very short game.

You play as Ellie, a kid with a troubled homelife. On your TV you hear about a resident who had something very strange happen to them in the local forest. Intrigued by this you follow in their supposed tracks, getting out of the house is a good idea anyway. Just as the voice on TV said you find an abandoned brick building in the middle of this forest. Ignoring your primal instincts to stay away from it you enter and things quickly spiral out of control. Is any of this real?

Controls:

Left/Right Arrow = Walk

Space = Used to jump on top of things (Unfortunately, it only works on one thing in this game).

Z = Interact

Q, W, E = (Kind of a spoiler)

X = Works as a go-back button for the pause menu.

Current Problems:

The audio controls don't work.

Sound issues in general.

The game has quite some bugs.

Lighting in some areas.
